conversationHistory.userMessage: How should I store leftover dal to prevent waste?
conversationHistory.botResponse:
Hello! I can help you with dal storage to reduce waste.

• Cool the dal completely before storing it.

• Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator (3-4 days).

• For longer storage, freeze in portion-sized containers (1-2 months).

• Consider turning leftover dal into dal paratha (approx. 40 BDT for ingredients).

Reducing food waste helps lower greenhouse gas emissions.

Next step: Refrigerate your dal in an airtight container promptly!
